alert.note: Alert for Bryan; Marshall (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 16 at 4:59PM CDT until March 16 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL BRYAN AND SOUTHERN MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 459 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Callisburg to near Kingston, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Durant, Kingston, Colbert, Silo, Mead, Cartwright, Willis, Woodville, Lake Texoma, Calera and Mcbride. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
